todo.alt: Preview of the Full Stack To-Do List project
todo.title: Full Stack To-Do List
todo.description: Complete application with React, Material UI, and TypeScript on the frontend, Node.js, Express, Prisma, and PostgreSQL on the backend, including JWT authentication.

problem.title: üí° Problem
problem.text: Simple task management applications usually do not offer secure authentication, reliable data persistence, or clear separation between frontend and backend, making system scalability and maintenance difficult as it grows.

solution.title: üõ†Ô∏è Solution

solution.text5: , consuming the API via Axios, while the backend centralizes business rules, authentication, and database access.

tech.title: üß† Technical Decisions
tech.text1: across the entire application for greater safety, readability, and reduced development-time errors.

tech.text4: between frontend and backend, following architectural best practices.

result.title: üìà Result
result.text: The project resulted in a functional, secure, and extensible application, serving as a solid foundation for future evolutions, such as user permissions, new task types, or integration with other services.

next.title: üöÄ Future Improvements
